title: Find Peak Element
body: A peak element is an element that is strictly greater than its neighbors. Given an integer array, find a peak element and return its index.
author: Saloni6111

comments.body: Implement Binary Search Algorithm to find out the peak elements in a sorted array with time complexity of O(nlogn) and space Complexity of O(1).So I would like to contribute in this issue.

> Implement Binary Search Algorithm to find out the peak elements in a sorted array with time complexity of O(nlogn) and space Complexity of O(1).So I would like to contribute in this issue.
